channel.title: Ravers Fantasy
channel.description:
Well...
list of things i've achieved... ;D Im not the worlds best coder ._. just thought i'd ask you how im doin :3 [ol][li]75% castle wars/Coding barricades and mining now.[/li] [li]90% Dwarf multicannon[/li] [li]95% mithril seeds. not clipped and doesn't correspond with the color on the ground ;p[/li] [li]All items that transform you into npcs work.[/li] [li]Retribution && working on wrath.[/li] [li]Earthquakes with 5 different scales.[/li] [li] Clipped following.[/li] [li]Loyalty titles, With the color on right click menu.[/li] [li]summoning interaction[/li] [li]2 quests, 5 achievements[/li] [li]Party room(still working on this)[/li] [li]Barrage orbs(not much lawl)[/li] [li]War minigame(pretty much like clan wars) Just.. With npc's on the teams.(still working)[/li] [li]Dominion tower[/li] [li]clan wars(..also not done)[/li] [li]Corresponding combat hit sprites.. I hope that makes sense xD[/li] [li]Npc special attack(not the familiar scrolls, i'm yet to start that)[/li] [li]Tornado's[/li] [li] Renamed items, npcs, and objects, nothing to be proud of, just felt like saying.. ;p[/li] [li]100% private messaging[/li] [li]items go to right slots(If it doesn't its like a 2 second fix)[/li] [li]Weekly penguin system (still working) >_<[/li] [li] some custom items with some custom features ._.[/li] [li]100% overloads and super pots spec restore ect.[/li][/ol]
ya so, as you can see. I don't get much done ;D
pictures: [url=http://www.runelocus.com/images/server_uploads/10532_10486.png]http://www.runelocus.com/images/server_uploads/10532_10486.png[/url] <-- won't show up on here for some reason ;p [url=http://www.runelocus.com/images/server_uploads/10532_10486.png]http://www.runelocus.com/images/server_uploads/10532_10486.png[/url] <-- won't show up on here for some reason ;p [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/th_wrath.png[/img] [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/th_wrath-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/th_cannon.png[/img] [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/transform.png[/img] [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/floewrs.gif[/img]
Too lazy to add anymore pictures. Tell me how im doing ;D

item.title: Ravers Fantasy
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

Well…

list of things i’ve achieved… ;D
Im not the worlds best coder ..
just thought i’d ask you how im doin :3
[ol][li]75% castle wars/Coding barricades and mining now.[/li]
[li]90% Dwarf multicannon[/li]
[li]95% mithril seeds. not clipped and doesn’t correspond with the color on the ground ;p[/li]
[li]All items that transform you into npcs work.[/li]
[li]Retribution && working on wrath.[/li]
[li]Earthquakes with 5 different scales.[/li]
[li] Clipped following.[/li]
[li]Loyalty titles, With the color on right click menu.[/li]
[li]summoning interaction[/li]
[li]2 quests, 5 achievements[/li]
[li]Party room(still working on this)[/li]
[li]Barrage orbs(not much lawl)[/li]
[li]War minigame(pretty much like clan wars) Just… With npc’s on the teams.(still working)[/li]
[li]Dominion tower[/li]
[li]clan wars(…also not done)[/li]
[li]Corresponding combat hit sprites… I hope that makes sense xD[/li]
[li]Npc special attack(not the familiar scrolls, i’m yet to start that)[/li]
[li]Tornado’s[/li]
[li] Renamed items, npcs, and objects, nothing to be proud of, just felt like saying… ;p[/li]
[li]100% private messaging[/li]
[li]items go to right slots(If it doesn’t its like a 2 second fix)[/li]
[li]Weekly penguin system (still working) ><[/li]
[li] some custom items with some custom features ._.[/li]
[li]100% overloads and super pots spec restore ect.[/li][/ol]

ya so, as you can see. I don’t get much done ;D
